data.text: @NHSuk Do you still believe in masks 🙈 https://t.co/guJVqCJiZy

@NHSuk This is very wrong and damages your credibility as an organization. Washing hands and Covid have very little to do with one another. Tell people the truth. Social distance, mask, and going outdoors will make a difference.
@NHSuk Not just for Covid bit all germs and bacteria!
@NHSuk As, much more importantly, do masks #WearAMask

@NHSuk China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019
Millions of people in the world are killed

@NHSuk Haha shall we sing happy birthday too? Maybe visit a hospital and shake hands wirh covid patients? How about common sense? Wear a mask and social distance? Oh no u stopped all that against SAGE advice oopsie
@NHSuk SOUND BITE. You make it sound like Covid-19 was the only infectious disease in existence and that people didn't really ever wash their hands before its existence.
